author: controlcthenv
content: docusaurus 2.0 is out, and it looks like it supports katex https://docusaurus.io/docs/markdown-features/math-equations. Think it would be worth moving it to that?

content: Yeah, to me docusaurus looked a lot user friendly and welcoming. What do you think?
